messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Fort Worth Police, somebody just got my purse out of the car in front.
Somebody just did what?
Grabbed my purse out of my car in front of Alpha Depot.
Did you see which way they went?
He's a black guy wearing a black stocking cap, a black leather jacket, and black jeans. He's about 5'9.
And he ran off towards the cinema, the theater?
Yes, towards the movie theater.
Are you in your car?
Yes, I am. I'm in a 2000 Buick Park Avenue, silver in color. My name is Valerie Pro.
There he goes. He's in blue jeans.
Okay. Is he on foot?
Yes, he's on foot.
Where's my purse? Give it to me now!
What's happening now?
He's in front of that movie theater. Now others are chasing him and he's just walking. He doesn't have my purse.
He doesn't have it? Did he throw it somewhere?
Yes, apparently he did.
Okay, are you still following him?
Yes, ma'am, I am, along with two other men.
When you talked to him, what did he say?
He said he had my purse and he wanted me to roll my window down, but I didn't.
I've lost him now. He may have gone into the movie theater.
Okay, let me see if anyone else has seen him. Did you say it was a black guy with a black stocking cap?
Yes, that's right. He grabbed my purse out of my car.
Okay, thanks. They've got him.
They do have him?
Yes, some civilians have apprehended him. Are you at the movie theater now?
Yes, we're in the parking lot.
Okay, I've got my purse. I need to check my money because I had $300 in here.
You got your purse and your money?
Yes, it's all here.
Alright. Do you need to stay on the line?
No, I've got about five or six men around here. Thank you so much.
You're welcome. Stay safe.
